content: ​​🪂 THE BIGGEST AIRDROP from IguVerse is starting right now🦎 We are launching our biggest major Airdrop - $25,000 in USDT! Complete simple tasks to get a chance to receive one of 50 prizes - $500 USDT each!⏳Start: now🛑End: 31th of May 18:00 GMT+2 (Paris Time)🔥 Link - https://wn.nr/AEBPpE

comments.author: sinatrra12
comments.body: 🦎Hello dear Iguana lovers!In a few days, our NFT Sale on Binance Marketplace is going live. NFTs will be available to buy for BUSD🚀Last time our NFTs were sold out in 2 minutes and after traded for x5 of mint price. Many people complained that they weren't able to buy, that's why we decided to simplify things for you.⏱The sale will start 25th of May, at 19:00 Paris time. Follow this page, provide your phone number and we will remind you with an SMS right before the sale. We want to give a chance to small investors to buy NFTs before big whales buy them all. May the luck be with youLink - https://iguverse.com/sale

comments.author: sinatrra12
comments.body: 🦎 Here’s our huge Announcement:Now we can say it loud! IguVerse - Seed Sale round has been closed & funded by a single Investor believing in the Project and the Team.$1,000,000 in tokens has been locked with vesting for 2 years together. This long lock-up period will give confidence to investors in the next rounds💰 Because of this huge success, we have amazing changes for our community. We are working faster than deadlines - launching a 3-week-long IGU Private Sale on the 25th of June. Private Sale tokens are locked up and vested only for 6 months which is very attractive for small investors. Read more informations in our Whitepaper.🪂 On the 25th of May there will be available the last 500 NFTs with Private Sale allocations. Our NFTs will give you allocation in a Private token sale with the best possible token price - $0.025. It's a 60% discount from the price that you can get without NFTs - a huge benefit for our true holders. 💬 Sign up to get the SMS notification on the sale day: https://iguverse.com/sale✅ New NFTs will be available 25th of May 19:00 Paris time on Binance NFT under the linkhttps://www.binance.com/en/nft/shopWindow/iguanametaverse-da826166b4028a27dfefa39d1f03d1b4?keyword=NEW🚀 Get on board before we launch to the moon!OFFICIAL LINKS:🔹 Telegram - https://t.me/Iguverse🔹 Telegram chat - https://t.me/iguverse_chat🔹 Twitter - https://twitter.com/IguVerse🔹 Discord - https://discord.gg/3jvsJKB9🔹 Website - https://iguverse.com/

comments.author: sinatrra12
comments.body: 🦎 Congratulations to the new Iguana owners! Our public sale is finished and 500 new beautiful lizards are now a part of the IguVerse universe. 😱 We finished our sale in less than 2,5 hours. Unfortunately, some users experienced a lot of lags with the Binance platform and weren’t able to cancel bidding offers after the sale started, which caused the freezing of funds for a certain period of time.Luckily, we were in touch with Binance support in real-time and managed to figure it out & unblock users’ funds asap, so new Iguana owners can enjoy the company of their beautiful lizards.👌 One of our first milestones is completed successfully and this is a great beginning of an amazing journey together!🔥 In the following days, we will announce our next steps. Stay tuned!

comments.author: sinatrra12
comments.body: ​🔝 Dear Iguanas, IguVerse is back in the tops on Binance NFT Platform! ✅ We once again managed to get into the 3rd position in Top Creators 30 days ranking thanks to everyone who believe in our project. 💪 In the future, we will continue to conquer the tops of Binance NFT and other platforms. Stay tuned!

comments.author: sinatrra12
comments.body: ​✅ Dear Iguanas, we are happy to announce that we are listed on CoinMarketCap 👉 https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/iguverse/🤝 We are negotiating listings terms with a few big reputable exchanges. At this moment, we can not share any details, we will reveal the secret as soon as we sign the contract.🗓 The starting day for the IGU token Private Sale round is the 25th of JuneCheck out more information about Private Sale in our Whitepaperhttps://whitepaper.iguverse.com/private-sale🚀 Tomorrow we will announce the date of the Iguanas Rank 0 sale. This is a special kind of NFT, that will give owners the right for airdrop of IGU tokens during the Private Sale Round. Iguanas Rank 0 price is $10,000 per NFT and owners are eligible to airdrop of tokens worth $10,000 with the best possible token price. Only 20 Iguanas Rank 0 are available for public.❓You can find more detail about Iguanas 0 in our Whitepaperhttps://whitepaper.iguverse.com/private-sale/iguanas-rank-0

comments.author: sinatrra12
comments.body: 🦎Dear community, today we will announce 50 winners of our 25,000 USDT Airdrop. We will publish winners on our all social media accounts.💸We will contact winners by email and ask for wallet addresses USDT TRC20. Winners have to provide wallet addresses till 1th of June 15:00 Paris time. We will distribute the prizes of 500 USDT to 50 lucky winners by 1th of June, 19:00 Paris time.
